thread.title: Sneakersnstuff & Social Status Team up on the adidas Ultra Boost
thread.title_full: Sneakersnstuff & Social Status Team up on the adidas Ultra Boost

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Sneakersnstuff & Social Status Team up on the adidas Ultra Boost
text:
Share Tweet Email WhatsApp Comments 
If you’re like most adidas fans, you simply can’t get enough of the company’s Boost sneakers. And whether it be new in-house colorways, or various collaborations , there really is no shortage of options when it comes to the ever-popular line. 
In terms of joint projects, here we get a look at the latest to take on the Ultra Boost. Sneakersnstuff and Social Status have thus come together for a unique rendition of the famed low-tops. 
The black and white kicks boast suede upper construction, while featuring leather lining and a reinforced toe. 
For now, the Sneakersnstuff x Social Status x adidas Ultra Boost has yet to officially be announced, which means there are currently no release details. As always, though, check back with us for more.
